item.description:
Copied from Soical Fun ....

$6 Movie Tuesdays --The Mechanic (2011)
Please get tickets at 6:55PM. --Moive Start time 7:15 PM.
We still meet at 7:00PM in Lobby to go in at 7:05PM to get good seats. Seats are all new and very comfy!!

The Mechanic (2011) ---This is a great action movie not to be missed on the Big Screen! Take a break from yuor work week and watch this great movie with us!

Location: Showcase Cinemas Woburn 25 Middlesex Canal Parkway, Woburn, MA, 01801
Meet in the lobby. Walk into the lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note there is one on the right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small round tables. This is so we have an exact spot to meet!

This movie looks great for 2011. Its time to see a good movie so do not miss out! You can't beat $6!
item.name: $6 Movie Tuesday in Woburn! "The Mechanic" TONIGHT with Social Fun.
